item.title: Serving Assets to My Website Part 1
item.description: Serving assets, such as images and documents, to be accessible to end users is essential to a modern web experience. As for what I have in mind with this blog, I want to visually capture steps that I took to help jog my memory of what I did or learned. Setting this up took me 30 minutes the first time. The steps are split into a series of posts to keep the posts short and organized.
